intro: Eutrema sulphureum, commonly known as yellow rocket, is a flowering plant native to North America. It belongs to the family Brassicaceae, which includes many other mustard family plants. The plant is characterized by its bright yellow flowers and its ability to thrive in disturbed soils. It is often found in meadows, roadsides, and other open areas. Eutrema sulphureum is known for its rapid growth and is sometimes considered a weed due to its invasive tendencies.
